plot: On her last active night in Vietnam, Captain Nancy Reeves of the US ARMY Nurse Corps faces the ultimate trauma of a base raid and must put herself between a berserk Vietcong and wounded triage patients in order to save their lives.
title: Her Vietnam
plot_es: On her last active night in Vietnam, Captain Nancy Reeves of the US ARMY Nurse Corps faces the ultimate trauma of a base raid and must put herself between a berserk Vietcong and wounded triage patients in order to save their lives.
plot_en: On her last active night in Vietnam, Captain Nancy Reeves of the US ARMY Nurse Corps faces the ultimate trauma of a base raid and must put herself between a berserk Vietcong and wounded triage patients in order to save their lives.
